opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Widner v. Crosby, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections

opinion:
537 U.S. 1182

WIDNER
v.
CROSBY, SECRETARY, FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS.

No. 02-6671.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 24, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE ELEVENTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 11th Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Carey v. Saffold, 536 U.S. 214 (2002). Reported below: 46 Fed. Appx. 618.
